name: TypeScript Package Audit
description: IronClaw scans tinyland-inc TypeScript packages for outdated dependencies, missing CI, license issues, and security vulnerabilities
process: List tinyland-inc repos with TypeScript/JavaScript as primary language
For each package: fetch package.json to check dependency freshness
Check for license file and SPDX compliance
Check for known security vulnerabilities via github_list_alerts()
Batch results by severity: critical (security), high (missing CI), medium (outdated deps), low (license)
Report findings with per-package breakdown and prioritized recommendations
